meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jonathan Dinerstein Maggie Byrd Kevin Patterson Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7897.

td.p: Jonathan Dinerstein, a composer from Los Angeles, California
Maggie Byrd, a communications professional from Arlington, Virginia
Kevin Patterson, a management consultant from Cambridge, Massachusetts (whose 1-day cash winnings total $20,001)

tr.td: CHARCUTERIE
WORLD HISTORY
THAT'S SOME STRONG LANGUAGE!
MAKING THE ZINE
SPORTS DRAFTS
7 WONDERS, 4 COUNTRIES
(Alex: You have to tell us what country the wonder would be in if it were still around today.)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Used to cure meat for sausages, a mix of sodium nitrite & sodium chloride is called pink this seasoning')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Used to cure meat for sausages, a mix of sodium nitrite & sodium chloride is called pink this seasoning
